          <title>
            <string language="fi">Viimeistely</string>
            <string language="en">Finishing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vollenden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Finissage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Revestimento</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Λήξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acabamiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten savityö viimeistellään apumuottia käyttäen.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how ceramics are finished by using an auxiliary mould.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ceramics</string>
            <string language="en">auxiliary</string>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
            <string language="en">finishing</string>
            <string language="fi">apumuotit</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">muottitekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie Keramik durch das 
Verwenden einer zusätzlichen Form beendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment la céramique est 
terminée en utilisant un moule auxiliaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como o ceramics é terminado 
usando um molde auxiliar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come la ceramica è 
rifinita usando una muffa ausiliaria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς την κεραμική τελειώνουν με 
τη χρησιμοποίηση μιας βοηθητικής φόρμας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo la cerámica es acabada
usando un molde auxiliar.</string>
          </description>
